unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather's a real gamble, no? Especially for crops like rice near Patna. One year, bumper harvest, next year, total loss due to untimely rains like in 2018. Heard IIT Kharagpur's working on solutions? Hope they crack it soon. Imagine farmers in Punjab relying on this... It's like waiting for Diwali, you hope for the best, but around 14/07/2023, you also pray. 10/10/2024 looking good so far! #JaiKisan at 17:00 hrs!
normalised: Arre yaar, weather's a real gamble, no? Especially for crops like rice near Patna. One year, bumper harvest, next year, total loss due to untimely rains like in two thousand and eighteen. Heard I I T Kharagpur's working on solutions? Hope they crack it soon. Imagine farmers in Punjab relying on this... It's like waiting for Diwali, you hope for the best, but around fourteenth july two thousand and twenty three, you also pray. tenth october two thousand and twenty four looking good so far! hash Jai Kisan at seventeen hundred hours!
